001package edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.controller;
002
003
004import android.content.SharedPreferences;
005import android.os.Bundle;
006import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
007import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
008import androidx.preference.DropDownPreference;
009import androidx.preference.PreferenceFragmentCompat;
010import androidx.preference.PreferenceManager;
011import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.R;
013
014/**
015 * A {@link Fragment} subclass used to display and manage the application's settings options.
016 */
017@AndroidEntryPoint
018public class SettingsFragment extends PreferenceFragmentCompat {
019
020  private SharedPreferences prefs;
021
022  @Override
023  public void onCreatePreferences(@Nullable Bundle bundle, @Nullable String key) {
024    setPreferencesFromResource(R.xml.settings, key);
025    String darkModePrefKey = getString(R.string.dark_mode_pref_key);
026    DropDownPreference pref = findPreference(darkModePrefKey);
027    prefs = PreferenceManager.getDefaultSharedPreferences(requireContext());
028    String darkModePrefDefault = getString(R.string.dark_mode_pref_default);
029    String darkModePrefValue = prefs.getString(darkModePrefKey, darkModePrefDefault);
030    pref.setSummary(getDarkModeEntryForValue(darkModePrefValue));
031    pref.setOnPreferenceChangeListener((preference, value) -> {
032      pref.setSummary(getDarkModeEntryForValue(String.valueOf(value)));
033      return true;
034    });
035  }
036
037  private String getDarkModeEntryForValue(String value) {
038    String[] entries = getResources().getStringArray(R.array.dark_mode_options);
039    String[] values = getResources().getStringArray(R.array.dark_mode_values);
040    for (int i = 0; i < values.length; i++) {
041      if (value.equals(values[i])) {
042        return entries[i];
043      }
044    }
045    return null;
046  }
047}
